channel.title: CVE Feed for Fahad Mahmood -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-44736|2024-08-03T14:01:31.281Z -- fahad%20mahmood -- chameleon%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Chameleon plugin <= 1.4.3 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-35696|2024-08-02T03:14:53.884Z -- fahad%20mahmood -- wp%20docs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Fahad Mahmood WP Docs allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Docs: from n/a through 2.1.3.
